subject: Double charged for subscription
content: I was charged twice for my monthly subscription last month. Order #12345. Please refund the duplicate charge immediately.

subject: API returns 500 error
content: Our production system is getting 500 errors from your API since this morning. Authentication endpoint is completely down. This is blocking our entire business.

subject: Enterprise pricing inquiry
content: We're evaluating your platform for our 500+ employee company. Can we schedule a demo and discuss enterprise pricing? We need to make a decision by end of month.

subject: Cannot reset password
content: I've tried resetting my password 5 times but never receive the reset email. I'm locked out of my account and have an important presentation tomorrow.

subject: What are your business hours?
content: Hi, I was wondering what your customer support hours are. Also, do you have phone support available?

subject: Subscription cancellation request
content: I'd like to cancel my subscription at the end of this billing period. How do I do that?

subject: Dashboard loading slowly
content: The analytics dashboard has been very slow to load for the past week. Sometimes it takes over 30 seconds. Other pages work fine.

subject: Feature comparison with competitor
content: How does your product compare to CompetitorX? We're trying to decide between the two. Do you have a comparison sheet?

subject: 2FA not working on new phone
content: I got a new phone and now my 2FA codes aren't working. I can't log in to my account. Can you help me reset 2FA?

subject: Great product, one suggestion
content: Love your product! Been using it for 6 months. One suggestion - it would be great to have dark mode in the mobile app.

subject: URGENT: Data export not working
content: We need to export our data for an audit that's happening tomorrow. The export feature keeps timing out. This is extremely urgent!

subject: Request for invoice copy
content: Could you please send me a copy of my invoice from January 2024 for my expense report? Account email: john@company.com

subject: Account ownership transfer
content: I'm leaving the company and need to transfer ownership of our team account to my colleague Sarah (sarah@company.com). How do we do this?

subject: Integration with Salesforce
content: We're trying to set up the Salesforce integration but getting authentication errors. We've followed the documentation but it's not working.

subject: Bulk discount for annual plan
content: We have 50 team members. Is there a bulk discount if we commit to an annual plan? What would the total cost be?

subject: Fraudulent charges on my card
content: I see charges from your company on my credit card but I never signed up for anything. This looks like fraud. Please investigate immediately!

subject: Where can I find API docs?
content: I'm a developer looking to integrate with your platform. Where can I find the API documentation?

subject: Complaint about support response time
content: I submitted a ticket 5 days ago and haven't heard back. This is unacceptable. I'm considering switching to a competitor if this isn't resolved.

subject: Upgrade to Pro plan
content: I'd like to upgrade from Basic to Pro plan. Can you walk me through the process and any migration steps needed?

subject: Security audit questionnaire
content: Our security team needs you to fill out a security questionnaire for vendor assessment. Who should I send this to?
